string.text: 次のタスクに進め
次のタスクを受ける
I want you to meet with someone. He is no friend of mine but he could use your assistance.
Good luck stalker.
Assassination for Lukash
Lukash has a target he needs eliminated.
Hey, I'm glad you came. I have something I need you to do for me. There is a mutual enemy of ours that needs to be eliminated. He is dangerous. Take him down immediately.
Awesome bro! Thanks.
Freedom Assault on Monolith
Lukash has asked you to lead Freedom in an assault against the Monolith.

Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I've recruited an assault squad and want you to lead them in an invasion on Monolith territory. Take them out.
Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
Search Lab X-8
Search Lab X-8 in Outskirts for evidence of Clear Sky occupation.

I have received information that former members of Clear Sky might have occupied Lab X-8 some time ago. I need you to investigate the Lab and see if you can recover any documents they might have left there.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce you to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys and I'll happily introduce you.

Good work. You're finally free. A word of warning though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce you to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys and I'll happily introduce you.

Good work. You're finally free. A word of warning though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Repel enemy assault
Intercept the assault squad closing in on a Freedom camp. Report back to Lukash once you have cleared the area.
Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
The task is done? Good.
Recapture territory for Freedom
You have been tasked to recapture faction territory. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
I have an important mission if you are willing. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need an infiltrator to reclaim it.
Excellent. Well done.
Eliminate Monolith Convert
A Freedom member has converted to the Monolith. Lukash has tasked you with finding and killing him.

I've got some real heavy news, man. One of our Freedom fighters have fallen under the influence of the Monolith. He was a good man, and I know he wouldn't have wanted to continue living as some alien crystal's brainwashed killer. Please, find him and take him down, otherwise his old friends are going to have to do it.
It's done? Good. I know this was rough. Our brothers at the Barrier will drink to their fallen comrade. As for you, here's your payment.
Assassinate target
Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
There's a certain individual who's been very loud in his opposition to Freedom, and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised.
Find %s
Lukash has asked you to find a specific firearm in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we're cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. Have you ever done any gun running?
We could really use a new %s. If you can find us one in great condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
Trigger Happy
Lukash wants to collect some %s.

Well, we're in a kind of hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, fanatics to the north, fanatics to the south, add some military dickheads for good measure. How about you show them what we think about their rules and ideals the good, ol'-fashioned way, huh?

Well, we're in a kind of hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, fanatics to the north, fanatics to the south, add some military dickheads for good measure. How about you show them what we think about their rules and ideals the good, ol'-fashioned way, huh? Get me some %s.
Hey, nice job, man. Here's your money.

Hey man. Here's a thing. Remember those Sin folks? They refuse to go away like a bunch of Jehovah's Witnesses, only violent and with guns. They didn't get the memo the last time you kicked their collective asses so I think it's high time for an encore. Lukash said they've been spotted being naughty in Zaton, especially around the area of abandoned substation workshops. Go put them down.
I knew they'd be no match for our Rambo. Great job man, you deserve a reward.
Rescue the Freedom Agent
A undercover agent needs to be extracted from a enemy faction, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the base. The spy has a SVD.

We have an agent undercover in an enemy faction however we fear he's being suspected, he missed the last few contacts and hasn't left any more messages. Probably he's being kept under watch so he can't afford to do anything besides playing along but they may decide to get rid of him without waiting for proof, we need to pull him out. We have located him nearby but he's with other stalkers, you need to kill them and escort him back. You can recognize him by his rifle, a SVD, he will have to shoot you back when you attack the group so keep it in mind.
Excellent, I'll have him report at once.
Hey man, stop! I'm the spy! Sorry for taking potshots at you. I had to keep my cover just in case...luckily you made it. Lead the way, I'll follow!
Thanks for pulling my nuts out of the fire, stalker! See you around!
Destroy the army reinforcements
Destroy the vehicles at the Cordon checkpoint.

It seems the army is sending in armored vehicles, no need to tell you how much of a pain in the ass they can be. Right now they should be stationed at the Cordon checkpoint. With any luck, they will be unmanned so you can destory them without being turned to swiss cheese. Either way, you'll need explosives for this.
Wild Game %s for Skinflint
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Skinflint in the Military Warehouse base camp.
I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?

Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in the kitchen.
Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
Deliver Equipment to Skinflint
Skinflint has a delivery that needs to be picked up.
I have a delivery that I need to pick up. If you're willing to get it for me I can give you an item from my inventory.
Thank you stalker!
Night Terror
Skinflint wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Bloodsucker Village.

You know 'bout the Bloodsucker Village, right? Well, our guys can handle the usual tentacle monsters just fine. But there's been this mean black motherfucker that only comes out to hunt at night. He's already killed a few good mates and I don't want the list to get any longer. Can you put a few bullets in its head for me?
Hah! No more gross tentacle rape for a while. Good job, man.
Scarce Supplies
Skinflint wants %s.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em. Can you bring some %s?
You're awesome, man.
Find the artefact hunting tools

Lukash wants to set up some teams to look for artefacts, we barely have people to man the Barrier and he wants to play treasure hunt. Anyway, he's pestering me to find detectors and shit, usually I'd just send somebody to Yantar but right now all my guys are away. I need Bear detectors and those lead boxes to store artefacts. If you go the extra mile and get us some batteries too, I'll be sure to set aside a little something on top of the regular reward. You in?
Find %s
%s are required by Screw to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.
Good, I need a %s. I will pay you if you can bring a set back to me.
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
Find %s
%s are required by Screw to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
Find %s
%s are required by Screw to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of Monolith soldiers is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a Monolith attack.
Monolith? I'll pass...
Whoa, free money. Here I come!
I wasn't planning to go to the Army Warehouses any time soon anyway.
Rewarded how, cash, artefacts, guns? I'm not going to drag my ass there for just some vodka.
Damn I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Killing Monolith? I'll do it for free, damn fuckers.
Can I keep what I find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help defend the Barrier.

Excellent, the scouts reported several Monolith squads approaching and any extra gun is welcome. Get in position and wait for the fanatics to show up, simple right? If you feel it's becoming too much and decide to run we won't hold it on you but of course you can forget the reward.
The Barrier is safe.. for now at least.
Good shooting stalker, this should cover some of the lead you put in those bastards. And a little extra to relax. Glad we had you around!
The scouts say they're on the move right now, everybody get in position!
Oh damn, watch out they got an RPG!
This ain't summer camp stalker. Be thankful there's people with more balls than you to keep your lot safe.
Good job brothers, and thanks to all the volunteers that didn't run away. Come back to me for your reward.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of zombies is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a zombie attack.
Poor things...
I'll pass, just doesn't feel right.
Well, at least it isn't Monolith.
This better be worth it, last time I spent more bullets than what I got in return.
Damn I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Zombies from the Radar? Damn, my friend went there just few days ago.
Can I keep what i find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help fighting the zombies.
Very well, usually they dont put up much of a fight but we are short on manpower thanks to Monolith and those pretend soldiers, it should be as easy as shooting at the range.
The horde is breaking through, everybody get in position!
Don't they ever end?
What is it, scared of things that can barely shoot back?
Good job brothers, finally they can rest in peace. Volunteers, come back to me for your reward.
They're all dead, for real now.

Very well, hope you didn't recognize anyone in there. Sometimes people come back from the Barrier more shaken up than when fighting Monolith. Let's have a drink at those poor souls, and something to help you not end up like them.
Hold on guys, we're coming to help!
We just departed from the base, we'll be there soon.
Is it that bad over there? I though you were enough!
It has already begun! Come on guys move your ass or we'll miss all the action!
Find %s
%s is required by Solid to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I owe you big time.
